title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1008/98 of 14 May 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1371/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the egg sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1008/98 of 14 May 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1371/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the egg sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 May 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
